Class CommonOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.test.blueprint.CommonOptions

  • public class CommonOptions
extends Object
    Helper to simplify the configuration of a Pax Exam container.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

      • getLogbackOptions

        public org.ops4j.pax.exam.options.MavenArtifactProvisionOption[] getLogbackOptions()
        Returns:
        a MavenArtifactProvisionOption array holding the logback-core and logback-classic dependencies using the versions supplied within the local pom.xml.

      • getAriesBlueprintOptions

        public org.ops4j.pax.exam.options.MavenArtifactProvisionOption[] getAriesBlueprintOptions()
        The MavenArtifactProvisionOptions required to include Aries Blueprint into the OSGi container. Aries dependencies are expected to be included within the project effective pom.
        Returns:
        The MavenArtifactProvisionOptions required to include Aries Blueprint into the OSGi container.
        See Also:
        ARIES_ARTIFACTS

      • getCoreAlgorithmsOptions
